name: Fartnite
description:
In this parody on Fortnite you are dropped on an island. You have a set of weapons to your desposal. You can use them to destroy the AI players, props or other human players. When the time is over you can see you score. You can also build and emote.

I made this game as a joke and to prove that I am capable of programming Fortnite with Unity (given enough time and resources)
